Unknown Pattern Generator - by Libgirl Co., Ltd.

  1. API

API

unknown
An unknown digit generator as a statefull object.
    next((unknown unknown) &optional (count 1) input-digit-list)

    Get next hex base unknown digit(s) counted by count and go to the next count -many further state. The same state always gives the same single digit.

    If input-digit-list is present,

    • after generating each unknown digit, each digit in input-digit-list is respectively consumed to change the state of unknown.
    • The same state with the same input always goes to the same next state.
    • If all input-digit-list is consumed and unknown digit generation is still going on, state change will continue without input inteference.
    • Surplus digits given in input-digit-list will be just discarded.
    copy((unknown unknown))
    Get a copy of unknown with the same state.

    Created with Codex.
